name: Neon Block Breaker
description:
Neon Block Breaker is a retro inspired, you guessed it block breaker game.

Featuring

  • Slightly rounded squares
  • Physics driven destruction
  • An endless stream of blocks for you to destroy
  • An online leaderboard
  • Synthwave music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

Installation (Windows)

  • Download the zip file
  • Extract the game from the zip file using a program such as 7-Zip or WinRAR
  • Open the extracted folder and run the executable

Final Word

If you've read this far, thank you! This is my first game and I really appreciate you taking the time to peruse this page. If you encounter any problems please do not hesitate to ask in the forums.
